title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Name services and configuration: DNS, DHCP, X500 directory services, LDAP. Internet security ? basics of authentication and encryption, SSL, Digital Signature, Kerberos. Network management: SNMP. CGI scripts, Scripting Languages ? Perl, PHP, Javascript, VBScript. Web Services ? XML, SOAP, UDDI, WSDL, Platforms for Web Services Development - .NET, J2EE, E-Commerce - Secure Electronic Transactions over the web.
